edit: also, can i ask for a feature? if you ever played with box sat, then you know that the parts have this cap part that will sit on the edge of the cube and make the box complete, how about instead of having two different truss one being profile and one having walls, you just have the truss and two different type of walls one for the bigger face and one for the in between small faces and one for top and bottom faces? this way, you may reduce the part count in the mod but gives players more flexibility to add the caps to the faces where and when they want.

Colliders are simple shapes for performance reasons.  3D gaming fact of life.
